name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Eugene MARSHALL, Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Ronald Eisenberg, Asst. Dist. Atty., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1012
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Eugene MARSHALL, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 22, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
William Fitzpatrick (Court-appointed), Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Ronald Eisenberg, Asst. Dist. Atty., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, LARSEN, FLAH-ERTY, McDermott and hutchinson, jj.
